prod_short_desc: Sail the high seas and make a thrilling rescue!
prod_long_desc:
Strap on your life vest as part of the LEGO® City crew at the Coast Guard Headquarters with 2 levels, office rooms and a moving radar dish. There’s also a ship with opening bridge and deck, moving radar dish and searchlight, medical area and a rescue craft with launch function, as well as a helicopter with helipad, speedboat and a buildable buoy. Includes 7 minifigures, plus shark and octopus figures.
Build the bustling Headquarters of the LEGO City Coast Guard, with multiple vehicles and a full Coast Guard Squad!
Includes 7 Coast Guard minifigures, plus a shark and an octopus figure
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Coast Guard Ship measures over 8” high, 16” long, and 3” wide. 2-level Observation Headquarters measures over 8” high, 7” wide, and 5” long
792 pieces – For boy and girls between the ages of 6 and 12 years old
